titleInfo.title: Gospel Program featuring Brother Norris Turner and More (17361)

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and blue on brown) announcing a Gospel Program featuring Brother Norris Turner, Reverend Squeaky Norris and the Harrison Gospel Singers, God Gospel Singers, Voices of Nashville, the Corder Family, and the Ross Brothers. Poster features a metal photoplate of Brother Norris Turner. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/43792/

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
